original_text: Ye are the salt of the earth: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be salted? it is thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out, and to be trodden under foot of men.
korean_text: 너희는 세상의 소금이니 소금이 만일 그 맛을 잃으면 무엇으로 짜게 하리요 후에는 아무 쓸 데 없어 다만 밖에 버려져 사람에게 밟힐 뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: Ye are the salt of the earth:
but if the salt have lost his savour,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 소금이 그 맛을 잃으면

sentences.original_text: it is thenceforth good for nothing,
and to be trodden under foot of men.
